name: Hospital CEO
description:
Do you want to be the manager of a hospital? this is your game. It is a 2D game inspired by Prison architect and Rimworld in its design and some of its mechanics.

We are currently in the early stages of development, if you download it now you will be able to see how the construction and zone management system works.

As we progress we will upload updates of the game.

Any questions or suggestions you have about the game you can leave them right here or email hospitalceo.game@gmail.com, we are happy to hear your opinion, constructive criticism and features that you would like to see.

Best regards,

Hospital CEO team.
